resources.string: Local SME providing skills training for domestic workers and gardeners. Empowering individuals through skills development and community growth.
We are a local SME initiated by Precious Radebe, dedicated to providing skills training for domestic workers and gardeners in the community.
Learn how to sew, take care of children,cook,maintain gardens, landscape,life skils and first aid.
Learn skills in only six months. Learn skills in only six weeks.
